attributes.action: Once Brexit negotiations with the EU are concluded, hold another referendum
attributes.additional_details: The Leave campaigns indicated that we could have access to the Single Market, could stop free movement of peoples, negotiate our own trade deals, be exempt from EU regulation, and cease all payments to the EU.  Many people voted "Leave" on that basis.  So give us all a chance, once actual exit terms are negotiated, to vote again.
attributes.background: Please allow us to vote on the actual terms of Brexit when negotiated, so that it is no longer a leap in the dark.
